author: Eric Elegado
comment: I quit my job so that I could work as a freelancer as well as take my licensure exam. While having a time of my own to balance my money-earning tasks and my schooling, I downloaded this app and bought its added features. Six months later, I passed my exams and was able to fulfill my freelance jobs with much ease. This app was very useful and I give it a lot of credit. Its customizable, gorgeous art design and reports can be exported via Excel. Pomodoro works and I didnt feel any stress. Really, thanks!

author: Ian Morrison
comment: Easily the best pomodoro timer on any platform. Has everything. Would perhaps be nice to sync with gcal, but it's basically just a joy to use. Update: bought the extras pack and Dropbox Todo sync isn't working, I guess there are api problems? App is authorized, but todo.txt doesn't appear in dropbox. An error "Error communicating with Dropbox" flashes onto the screen for a second. But Dropbox app & website are fine.

author: Santiago Quintero
comment: Clockwork tomato is the best pomodoro app there is, hands down. It works perfectly out of the box, but it is extremely customizable. You can change the duration of each part of the pomodoro, determine whether you want to extend a section or move on to the next one, and even set different sounds for each section of a pomodoro.  Most importantly, it tracks the pomodoros you make and gives you statistics on your productivity.  The only thing that I would add is the option to track distractions too,  like Flat Tomato on iOS.   I highly recommend this, and even more the extension pack (it's cheap and it adds profiles and the ability to keep todos).

author: Karen Long
comment: This app has got me moving and working so many times in the morning that it's become part of my routine. Plus, I love the different profiles and the ability to change the length of the Pomodoros. Thanks for keeping this updated so well!

author: Vox In Socks
comment: This app has been so helpful when studying for tests or writing papers since I tend to work for 4 hours straight and it makes me exhausted very easily. With the pomodoro technique it reminds me to take breaks every so often to do things like go to the bathroom or grab yet another cup of coffee. 😂😂 This app is so much easier than setting a timer over and over again, and the customizability is amazing. A solid 5/5 from me!

author: Rajat Hedaoo
comment: There is no description how to use the app and how breaks are allocated. Like I have heard from my friend that there is a long break after 4 short breaks but it should me mentioned somewhere in the app.

author: Jesse Adams
comment: I really like the app design, but the fact that the sounds can't be switched to the media channel makes this app useless to me. I keep my phone on silent as to not disturb people around me. But this makes it so the notifications from this app don't make a sound. And of the volume is up, the sounds play through both the phone speaker and through the headphones, disturbing those around me.

author: Jari Hyle
comment: Android Wear side is lacking. You shouldn't just let notification to show the info. A clock element would be better or a whole clock face, not talking about wear app as a whole.

author: Ashley LaLa
comment: I wanted to love this app, because it had all the features I wanted in a pomodoro timer. However, I was really surprised it does not enable changing the timer speed. The rate of the timer was at a much higher meter than I would like, and I felt a lot of anxiety the entire time it ran. Like was being forced to hurry up. The parameters enable changing the volume, but not the speed. Considering a main feature of a pomodoro timer app is the sound of the ticking, it surprised me that an app with so many features would not support greater flexibility on a functional aspect of the design. Too bad, because I liked the concept a lot.

author: Tjaart Venter
comment: Awesome app.  Upgraded so I can log time against tasks / projects and works well.  Only issue I have is that 2 of my projects were allocated the same color which makes it a bit difficult to distinguish between them in the graphs etc.  Would be awesome if we could customize the colors of the projects (or at the very least not be given the same colors).  And a Gear S2 version (which should preferably sync back to the phone app) would also be great.  i.e. control the clock from my Gear S2, but see logged pomodoros in the phone app.  Just a thought.  :-)

author: Olivier Forget
comment: Dropbox issue was fixed. Thank-you! Overall good app with a few UI quirks that I don't like. Still the best pomodoro timer for my money.

This app is absolutely perfect for use in a quiet study space, as you can set it to blink 3 seconds before the timer changes; meaning i can have it on silent, and it still grabs my attention! Fully customizable, even the colours of the clock itself. Thank you so so much ♡

author: Character994
comment: This is at the moment probably the best overall pomodoro app, it's fairly complex yet easy to use. It works well with Tasker. An improvement would be adding extra options to the extended timers.

author: Daniel Cuevas
comment: Great app but the Dropbox sync is currently broken. ***UPDATE*** Newest update has fixed the Dropbox sync. Had to re-instate connection, works perfectly.

author: Rik A M
comment: Loved it! Helps me a lot in my studies and other activities. For examples, I have profiles for regular studying, studying when i'm tired, Gym exercises and Full energy studying.

author: Elise Olarte
comment: On the 10 day pro trial. It's not easy for me to use at first but once I explored it, it's awesome. There's a high chance I might purchase it. (testing other similar apps to see which is yhe best.)

author: Cory Befus
comment: Awesome app. A great blend of simple usability and detailed tweakability that is really rare. Has a few quirks, but overall it's the best pomodoro out there.

author: Emily Selleck
comment: Wish I knew why I can't access the widget, but the timer itself is fine. It's just frustrating not having all the advertised features.

author: Zachary Cabrera
comment: Dropbox syncing isn't working for me currently. Keep getting "error connecting to dopbox account" very frustrating.

author: Ti Heera
comment: It's a useful app but there is no restore factory settings option, I have to reinstall every time I mess up the settings

I don't know whether it's some setting or a bug. It's not working as it should. When 25 minute session ends, 5 minute break starts, but when this break ends, it starts another 5 minute break instead of 25 minute session.

author: drishti Pargai
comment: Can you please put a just vibration option also..it does not work and all the sounds and also the ticking sound disturbs others sometimes while helping me...otherwise an awesome app

author: Kuang Ri Bi
comment: Hi! Can you please put managing work schedules inside the app so that it acts some sort of a reminder to us when we do something. Thanks.

author: Saurabh Tripathi
comment: I really don't get it much. It is one of very few apps I found difficult to understand.

author: dEDa mika
comment: The app sounds don't work
Works great really helps me get things done.

author: Yan Li
comment: Great app. Powerful and easy to use. Would be five star if I could figure out how to see how many pomodoros I did for each task.

author: Kemo Developer
comment: After 5 different pomodoro apps I found golden one!!!! The best pomodoro app on the whole earth!

author: BasBoBas
comment: pain in the ass to get the todo.txtto work

author: Adam Crane
comment: Best pomodoro app on Android, hands down. Made by a real developer with attention to detail, not one of these cash grab app factories.

author: Joshua Nazareth
comment: Was unable to sync with dropbox.

author: Priyank Kumar
comment: Please add function of gmail synchronisation.Its damm important to use it in other device.

author: Shubham Thakur
comment: The app is good but the pre end and end notification tones aren't working ....its just showing silence in settings !

author: Aleksandra Nikiforova
comment: Don't support any system ringtones, only what's downloaded in music folder

author: Erick Pasqua
comment: Best Pomodoro app ever. Full of options for the smoothest workflow, almost fully handsfree.

author: Ayka Aykaa
comment: I can't use it in my huawei smartwatch

author: R Ardhika
comment: Will be perfect if the app has pause button and preferences to show/hide that pause button.

author: Nathan B
comment: Dropbox?  Everyone's LEAVING dropbox!

author: Udith VB
comment: The best app for productivity, hands down!

author: Amit Kumar
comment: It's awasome
